name: Crasy Hungry Wolf (Prototype)
description:
Personal challenge to test several ideas on Unreal Engine.

(after long vacation)

Objective  -> make a simple EndlessRunner in 4 days.

instructions :

Direct the wolf with the Left and Right keys

Eat as much meat as you can, but be careful, every time you eat meat, your speed increases.

Find the potions to collect more meat without increasing your speed.

To quit the game, press the Escape key!

Thanks a lot to Imageparseconde for these assets and animations.

https://sketchfab.com/ImageParSeconde

Music : Of Far Different Nature (Dark Ritual)

https://fabian-h.carrd.co/
